pages.text: $(c:/ftbquests open_book 3F61325EA08B6DAA)&c$(l)---> Open Quest Page <--- $(/c)$(br)&rYou may have noticed some &eNether&r mobs dealing more &cFire Damage.&r Mobs native to a specific dimension tend to have an affinity towards a specific element. For example, in the Nether, some mobs will deal a combination of Fire and Physical Damage. &oAlso note, this doesn't mean they will take less damage from the element they have an affinity for.&r

&nElemental Affinities&r

&lOverworld:&r &7None&r
&lNether:&r &cFire&r
&lUndergarden:&r &5Chaos&r
&lAquamirae&r Mobs: &bCold&r
&lEverbright:&r &bCold&r + &eLightning&r
&lEverdawn:&r &cFire&r + &5Chaos&r
&lThe End:&r &cFire&r + &eLightning&r + &5Chaos&r
&lThe Otherside:&r &5Chaos&r
&lThe Twilight Forest:&r &7None&r
